wikipedia_page.main:
Derrell Olpherts (born 7 January 1992) is an English professional rugby league footballer who plays as a winger, fullback or centre for the Castleford Tigers in the Super League.
He has previously played for the Dewsbury Rams in the Championship, the Hemel Stags and the Newcastle Thunder in League 1, and the Salford Red Devils in the Super League.

response: Following the arrival of Sosaia Feki and Derrell Olpherts at Castleford for 2020, Clare was given squad number 21. He made a strong start to the campaign and had made 5 appearances and scored 4 tries when the season was suspended in March.
